name: Kick and Kill
overview: A platforming game created by Christian Dombarcher, published in 64'er Sonderheft 85 in 1993. Tailor-made for choleric people: In this game, whoever reaches the ceiling first wins! Hustle and bustle on the playing field for one or two players, lots of sprites, continuously increasing level of difficulty, cheat mode and individual game design through »Sets: These are the highlights of this fun Jump'n'Run game! The remaining files are fetched into the computer using a fast loading routine. When the cover picture appears on the screen, continue with space. Now you can display the description of the game with (Instructions). No matter which choice you make: It must be confirmed with space. But wait until both characters have appeared at the top of the screen. In the game the two broomsticks Clean and Clone have to try to drive away the bugs. Use F5 to change the level of difficulty. Alone or in pairs you have to try to ban all the Nasties from the scene. But be careful: If you touch the lively goblins, you will lose one of your lives!
